description:
Migration project includes building a modern, highly responsive, and scalable web application using a ReactJS front end that integrates with a set of .NET Core microservices and MongoDB data stores as a modernization effort of a legacy application. Additional responsibilities include: 
 Applying application changes into a production environment, working with government cloud provider. 
 Management of internal environments using TeamCity, Octopus Deploy, AWS, and Docker. 
 Design new microservices using C#, .NET Core, and MongoDB. 
 Present monthly code changes to client and perform task planning using Agile methodologies. 
 Migration of data in various forms for onboarding new government agencies.
